enigma_edit.lua.data

Class Expression

  • java.lang.Object
    • enigma_edit.lua.data.Data
      • enigma_edit.lua.data.SourceData
        • enigma_edit.lua.data.Expression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source, Typed

    public class Expression
extends SourceData
    An expression within the lua code, that is not interpreted by the CodeAnalyser. This is any expression at all with the exceptions of equality comparisons of boolean values. TODO: mention multilevel support in comment to Expression

        public java.lang.String typename()

      • typename

        public java.lang.String typename(Mode2 mode)
        Description copied from interface: Typed
        Returns the type of the value represented by this object in human readable form. If this instance is a value already, the result is the same as for Typed.typename(). Otherwise this is either a multi-mode value or a reference, in which case the type of the underlying instance will be returned.
        Specified by:
        typename in interface Typed
        Overrides:
        typename in class SourceData

      • checkSimple

        public SimpleValue checkSimple(Mode2 mode)
        Description copied from interface: Typed
        Check if this represents a SimpleValue in the given mode. If it does, it is returned; otherwise null is.
        Specified by:
        checkSimple in interface Typed
        Overrides:
        checkSimple in class SourceData
